lines.text: You know your problem? You need a wife.
[Costas grabs Natsuo and holds him on his lap]
A wife? Hey, I just think we oughtta live together for a while first.
Ah-ah. Bust my ass no good.
You forgot the prototype - now you're gonna die.
Now I tell you whole story.
You good cop and honorable man.
You were supposed to negotiate with him, not kill him.
[Costas and Natsuo have broken into a suspect's house and set off the burglar alarm]
Isn't someone going to hear that and call the police?
No, you see in this neighborhood they don't call the police, they just yell "Turn that shit off".
